10: Upper logic
10_s0: Start state
10_s1: Top: Start
10_s1_e0: [General] lower-level state map switching
10_s1_w0: [Search enemy] Character _ target setting
10_s2: Higher rank: search enemy ON
10_s2_e0: [Search enemy] Character _ target setting
10_s2_e1: [Operation] Lock on
10_s3: Top rank: Search off
10_s3_e0: [Operation] Lock on
10_s4: Top: with target
10_s5: Top: no target
20: Lower logic
20_s0: Start state
20_s1: Lower logic: start
20_s2: Attack action_SubState
20_s3: Long distance action_SubState
x0: Attack behavior
x0_s0: Start state
x0_s1: End state
x1: Long distance action
x1_s0: Start state
x1_s1: End state
